landing.bio: A Computer Science Student and a Self Learner.

experience.aboutWork: Learning java programming and building applications using java programming language.
Contributed to an ecommerce web backend server and frontend as an intern. Resolving some previous issues and added some new features to the ecommerce Web platform.
Working as a software developer and we are building something new together.
Worked as a graphic designer and was responsible for designing creative contents and handouts based on different marketing strategies.

education.degree: Bachelor of Computer Science and Engineering

interests.paragraphOne: Apart from being a web developer and a beginner programmer, I enjoy most of my time being outdoors and play football. In the winter, I do a lot of cycling around. I enjoy mountain biking, free climbing, and kayaking.
interests.paragraphTwo: When forced indoors, I follow a number of sci-fi, thriller and crime genre movies and television shows, I am a true technology geek, and I spend a bunch of my free time exploring the latest technology advancements in the current tech world.

awards.awardDetail: Academic Computer Club Logo Design Contest of Southeast University

Recieved the award from a very honourable person of our country who is none other than Dr.Ehsanul Haque who became the first person to achieve PHD Degree in Computer Science and Engineering in Bangladesh.
